author: jemenger
content: This validation would require knowing the version of solidity, correct? The assumption would be that the same version as the audit would be used for the deposit contract, but in this case I am calling for more formal process so it can be understood how it is built and deployed. That we would not have to dig around, rely on authority and etherscan, etc. to do that validation.

author: jemenger
content: Also, FYI, exact version of solidity and command to compile is in the spec.  https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/tree/dev/solidity_deposit_contract
